member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Helpers.HttpRequestBaseExtensions.GetUnvalidatedCollectionValue(System.Web.HttpRequestBase,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Loads the Form or QueryString collection value from the unvalidated object in System.Web.Webpages, if that assembly is available.

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Helpers.HttpRequestBaseExtensions.GetHttpMethod(System.Web.HttpRequestBase)
member.remarks: The reason we have our own is to provide support for System.Web.Helpers.Validation.Unvalidated calls.
